content:
I'm able to spend about an hour during weekdays and more during weekends to work on the compiler, and I'm trying to spend my time more productively. For that I'm curious which areas of the compiler, or issues, or tasks (maybe refactoring or something like that), have people available for questions. So far I fixed a few simple issues, but when I tried to fix more involved issues (#80258, #79590) getting answers for my questions turned out to be a challenge. So instead I'm thinking of working on a part of the compiler that has someone willing to answer questions.

Any ideas on what those areas or issues might be? Thanks.
The ones with E-medium may be too hard though, so you might want to look for E-mentor with no label or with E-easy.
